reviewText: This dvd showed the flashes of the explosions in the towers, something I had not seen before. It is well done, and the different lengths give you flexibility when you show it to others.

I was watching ABC's Good Morning America on 9/11 and watched LIVE beginning at the time the second plane hit the tower. From there on I switched to CNN's live coverage and stayed with it all day. What this "documentary" shows is NOT what actually occurred. This DVD mixes a lot of fiction with a little reality. Why would anyone do something like this? I guess there are people with perverted minds who will do anything to make a buck. Don't give them your money unless you're one of those perverts who can believe anything. If that's the case, better line the interior of your home with aluminum foil to keep those space-aliens from eavesdropping on you.
This movie is a joke and anyone who subscribes to this idiocy are the real fools
This DVD complements the literature on why 911 was an inside job.

This is the DVD the world has been waiting for.

Designed in three lengths, 10 min. 30 min. & 60 min.

it is perfect for convincing skeptical friends.

What American Patriot doesn't have 10 minutes to

take a look at historical evidence about 9.11

when the fate of our nation is at stake?

The world was shocked and traumatized by this event

and this is the best medicine to help people recover.

This act of treason must exposed.

Easy to understand science examples and analysis of

evidence prove without a doubt that the official story

is a BIG LIE to fool the public and justify unlimited

military spending that is bankrupting the nation.
